content.raw:
nice! When we tell people to RTFM, we can just point them to this PDF...

Thinking about the spacenav, there are diagrams that are sort of helpful for using the spacenav, we could considering putting one in this document or the teleop tutorial

![spnav](http://www.robotshop.com/media/files/images/3dconnexion-spacenavigator-3d-mouse-6-large.jpg)
